game.title: The Dragon's Lair
game.objective: To vanquish the dragon ravaging the kingdom
game.description: A dragon has settled in the mountains and is terrorizing the villagers. Your quest is to find the dragon's lair, defeat the dragon and restore peace to the kingdom.
game.reward: A dragon's hoard of gold and the title Dragon Slayer

task.description: You must journey to the mountains and find the entrance to the dragon's lair.
Avoid the dragon's fire breath and strike it down with your sword.
Report your successful dragon slaying to the King and collect your reward.
